metadata.title: USN-4693-1 -- Ampache vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that an SQL injection vulnerability exists in the Ampache search engine. Any user able to perform searches could dump any data contained in the database. An attacker could use this to disclose sensitive information. (CVE-2019-12385)  It was discovered that an XSS vulnerability in Ampache. An attacker could use this vulnerability to force an admin to create a new privileged user. (CVE-2019-12386)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4693-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ampache-common - 3.6-rzb2779+dfsg-0ubuntu9.2 ampache - 3.6-rzb2779+dfsg-0ubuntu9.2 No subscription required
